definitions.definition: a person whose job is to prepare and sell medicines, and who works in a shop
a shop that sells medicines and usually also soap, make-up, etc.

examples.text: You can obtain the product from all good chemists.
Take this prescription to the chemist's.
I'll get it at the chemist's.

wordOrigin: late Middle English (denoting an alchemist): from French chimiste, from modern Latin chimista, from alchimista ‘alchemist’, from alchimia, from Arabic al-kīmiyā', from al ‘the’ + kīmiyā' (from Greek khēmia, khēmeia ‘art of transmuting metals’).
